sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; export default function TaskList(props) { const {tasks, handleTaskDelete, handleEditTaskClick} = props; const [listup, setListup] = useState(false); console.log(tasks, " in TaskList()"); // JSX return (

TASK LIST

    {tasks.length < 1 ?

    No tasks at this moment...

    : tasks.map((task, id) =>

  • Task ID: {task.id}

    Title: {task.title}

    DESCRIPTION: {task.details}

    STATUS: {task.status}

    PRIORITY: {task.priority}

    DUE DATE: {task.dueDate}

    REMAINING DAYS: {task.remainingDays} days

    • ) }
{!listup ? "" :

  • Task ID

    Task Title

    Description

    Status

    Priority

    Due Date

    Remaining Days

    Delete

    Edit

    • {tasks.map((task, id) =>

  • {id + 1}

    {task.title}

    {task.details}

    {task.status}

    {task.priority}

    {task.dueDate}

    {task.remainingDays}

    • )}
}
); }
